thread.section_title: Couture Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Couture Boutique | coutureusa.com
thread.title: Mena

author: Mena
title: Mena
text:
My first purchase on line from Couture Boutique in Florida. The product arrived exactly as described, great condition, clean, odor free well packaged. The delivery was exactly as per the website with a tracking number easy to track the route I knew when to expect the package.
I placed a call before ordering the Scarf customer service was excellent. Another thing that impressed me was, after I placed the order within minutes the item was no longer on their website.
I will order from Couture Boutique again without hesitation.
Thank you.
